summary.p: Traveled to T端bingen to speak with Philipp [Melanchthon] about the promotion of concord; will report in more detail upon his return.

div.p: As I hoped to find Philipp in T端bingen, I set out on the journey, and my hope did not deceive me. I found him engaged by the prince and still working on the cause of reforming the academy in T端bingen. I am now dealing with him on the matter of promoting concord, not hindering it, but concluding it more firmly and surely. When I return home, I will inform you of the rest.
Farewell with the brothers and lords.
To Lord Heinrich Bullinger, Antistes of the Church of Zurich, dearest brother.
